channel.title: Gal Gadot on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gal Gadot on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gal Gadot Gets Choked Up, Requests “Urgent” Prayers for Israeli Hostages Amid Gaza Conflict
item.description: The actress attended a United Hatzalah of Israel gala in Los Angeles at which she presented an award to Nova Music Festival survivor and Eurovision breakout star Yuval Raphael.

item.title: Gal Gadot Gets Choked Up, Requests “Urgent” Prayers for Israeli Hostages Amid Gaza Conflict

item.title: ‘In the Hand of Dante’ Review: Oscar Isaac, Gal Gadot and Gerard Butler Star in Julian Schnabel’s Bonkers, Wildly Uneven Literary Adaptation
item.description: Premiering out of competition at Venice, the film — based on Nick Tosches’ 2002 novel revolving around Dante’s ‘Divine Comedy’ — also features Jason Momoa, Al Pacino and Martin Scorsese.

item.title: Filmmaker Julian Schnabel Defends Gal Gadot in Venice: “There’s No Need to Boycott Artists”
item.description: The veteran auteur, in Venice to world premiere ’In the Hand of Dante,’ also opened up on his influences for a film that stars Oscar Isaac, Gerard Butler, Al Pacino, John Malkovich and Martin Scorsese

item.title: Gal Gadot Clarifies Her Comments Blaming ‘Snow White’ Box Office on Israel Views
item.description: The actress is walking back her comments, which blamed the Disney’s films poor performance on its cast being prodded to talk about Israel.

item.title: Gal Gadot on the “Disappointment” of ‘Snow White’ Flopping and Working With Rachel Zegler: “We Had Fun”
item.description: The ‘Wonder Woman’ actress admits: “It is what it is, you win some, you lose some.”

item.title: Jerusalem Film Festival Winners: Netalie Braun’s Israeli Anti-War Movie ‘Oxygen’ Takes Top Prize, ‘The Secret Agent’ Nabs Best International Film Award
item.description: Netalie Braun’s anti-war film “Oxygen” took the top prize at the 42nd Jerusalem Film Festival which kicked off on July 17 with an honorary tribute to Gal Gadot. “Oxygen”
